BOTK Sparql package samples doc

Running samples

To execute samples in this dir:
  1. download and install Composer with required dependencies: 
    curl -s http://getcomposer.org/installer | php; php composer.phar install
  2. Configure a php enabled web server to publish samples directory and point browser to it. This file should be shown.
  3. Click links to run examples
  4. See sources
  5. Play with http headers (i.e. Accepts) and http methods using an interactive REST client compatible with your browser (here an example for chrome).

rawquery.php

This script returns turtle data from a query to dbpedia without parsing resuts. Try it.

query.php

Like rawquery.php but parsing resuts. Try it.

iquery.php

This examples shows the usage of Guzzle Iterator applied to sparql command. This scripts iterates on dbpedia resource slicing response in payloads of about 1MB each. It download 10000 items from dbpedia and prints some statistics. Please do not abuse of this script in order to not waste dbpedia resources. Try it.

sparqAgent.php

This script realizes a simple Semantic Web Agent that acts as a proxy to a generic remote SPARQL endpoint. It accepts as GET parameters an sparql endpoint url, a urlencode sparql query an the username and password to be used to access sparql endpoint. It makes the query to the remote endpoint and provides back result managing content negotiation. It provdes als hyperlinks to edit the query and to show alternate formats for resuts.This script can be drived by this simple html form. Note that this script is able to manage SARQL entailment if endpoint supports it.

easyRdfQuery.php

Same behavior as query.php but it is implemented using EasyRdf interface. Try it.
